descrip: View classic shitposts from the Replit community, collectively called The Dumpster

random.brief: Get a random post in the dumpster

args.seed: (optional) An integer to seed the random generator with.

tag.brief: Search a list of entries by tag name

args.name: Name of the tag to search for.

dive.brief: Find an entry in the dumpster that best matches the given name.

args.name: Name of the entry to search for.

sdive.brief: The same functionality as `dump.dive`, but returns only the image.

args.name: Name of the entry to search for.

count.brief: Get the number of entries in the dumpster.
